title: Finland attack: One dead and 10 injured after 'violent incident' at school in Kuopio shopping centre
text:
At least one person has died after a ‘violent incident’ at a school in a shopping mall in Finland's Northern Savonia region, according to police.

Officers confirmed they had used firearms and one person had been taken into custody, but did not elaborate on the nature of the violence at the Savo Vocational College - which is based in the Herman shopping centre in the city of Kuopio.

A statement from the East Finland Police said at least ten people were harmed during the incident, with two suffering serious injuries.
